|brand = Sitecom |model = WLR-6000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/26/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Sitecom_WLR-6000 |wlclass = AN750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = U2M-WBR5200MGN |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3883;RT3883F; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;25L6406E; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 64:D1:A3 |oui = 64:D1:A3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 3.1.0.0; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;Ralink SDK 3.1.0.0
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, 4-pin header, unpopulated, J12 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;SiGe;SE2537L;;3;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ITE Tech;IT7652M;;2;,,, 2A, 5V Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ITE Tech;IT7802M;;1;,,, 3A, 23V, 340kHz, Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7184S;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = SitecomXXXXXX, |defaultssid_regex = ^Sitecom[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/04/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 8716502023660 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B005GX9WZA |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT5392;RT5392L |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is presumed to be a ''Senao'' WBR5200MGN. It's noted in its FCC test report :(and the FCC EUT's board is silkscreened w/ text indicating it's a WLR-6000 v1). :The FCC ID of the WBR5200MGN has been assigned to this entry, but there is likely :(almost certainly..) no FCC ID on the device's label.
Per the manual, the password is on the label of the device.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.sitecom.com/download/5022/WLR-6000-Full-Manual-English.pdf Manual] *[http://www.madshrimps.be/articles/article/1000294/Sitecom-N750-X6-WLR-6000-Wireless-Gigabit-Router-Review/5# ''Sitecom N750 X6 WLR-6000 Wireless Gigabit Router Review''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/images/stories/wireless/engenius_esr750h/engenius_esr750h_fcc.jpg FCC - PCB]
